bibl.title: Monumental Tombs of Ancient Alexandria. The Theater of the Dead.
bibl.note: Introduction. - 1. The Monumental Tombs of Ancient Alexandria: Setting the Scene. - 2. The Earliest Alexandrian Monumental Tombs and Their Antecedents. - 3. Theater of the Dead: Theatricality in Alexandrian Tombs. - 4. The Tombs of Pharos Island: Cultural Interplay and Ethnic Identity. - 5. The Emergence of the Individual: The Saqiya Tomb and the Necropolis at Wardian. - 6. The Uses of Egypt in Roman Alexandria. - 7. The Legacy of Alexandrian Tombs. - Appendices. Bibliography. Notes. Index.
